titles.title: Capital Gains Exclusion Expansion Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exclusion for gain from certain small business stock to 100 percent for stock held for more than 10 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/21/1995--Introduced. Capital Gains Exclusion Expansion Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a 100 percent exclusion of the gain from the sale or exchange of certain small business stock held for more than ten years.
